name: Hank man
description:
Hank man is a game based on Hang Man, a classic paper game where two people or more participate and try to guess a given word.

In this game, a word is chosen by the computer and you have six attempts to guess it. Each time, you try to enter a letter that is in the word. If the letter is in the word, it will appear where it would be. Otherwise, a limb will appear on the hang, slowly forming a stickman.

Example here.

Hopefully you get the point. The less errors you make, the more money you earn by the end of the game. You can buy cosmetics with that money inside the shop.

Good luck.
